availability.translation[0].definitions[: the state of being able to be used, bought, or found
Rooms are offered subject to availability  (=only if they are available).
the state of being able to do something because you have enough time
He has been asked about his availability to take part in the competition.
availability.translation[1].definitions[: the fact that something is able to be used or can easily be bought or found
a phrase meaning that it is possible to buy or choose something if it is still available
The weekend breaks can be taken any weekend, subject to availability.
